$LINK is very impressive. If you're an investor and hodl, this coin must be in your portfolio.   Some of the best FA & TA I've seen in a long time and I wouldn't be surprised if they become one of the biggest standouts of 2019. Super big fan here.

The $LINK token is much more than a utility token, since it could be argued that utility with high velocity won't necessary make it high in price. Having a store of value/staking mechanism, which takes most coins off the market will bring a big rise in the token price. #Bullish

12000 SAT is only psychological resistance for $LINK and is going to break sooner than later. Price discovery in its $BTC value is coming, especially because its $USD value is still low comparatively. There's no other chart like it, which shows people believe in the fundamentals.
